mapper.select: select Oneline.id, writerId, content, regDate, memberId, m.image from Oneline left join Member as m on m.id = Oneline.memberid where Oneline.id = #{id}

select Oneline.id, writerId, content, regDate, memberId, m.image, (select count(id) from OnelineComment where onelineId = Oneline.id) count from Oneline left join Member as m on m.id = Oneline.memberid where Oneline.id order by regdate desc LIMIT #{size} offset #{offset};
